basic.description:
An exploration of the history of the theory and practice of development with particular reference to Tropical Africa.
LEARNING HOURS    360 (72S;288P)
basic.subject: HIST
basic.title: Theory and Practice Development

extra.enrollment_requirement: PREREQUISITE    A Grade of C+ in 6.0 units from HIST 300-329 and registration in a HIST Major or Medial Plan.
